full_summary:
### Canadian Government Tender Announcement

#### Proposal Name
Technical Review and Advice for All Season Road Proposal, Northwest Territories

#### Solicitation Number
5P468-22-0200/A

**Important Dates:**
* Publication Date: December 23, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 31, 2023, at 16:00 (ET)
* Amendment Date: January 20, 2023

**Tender Description:**
Parks Canada invites contractors to submit a proposal for technical review and advice related to the construction, operation, and maintenance of Phase 2 of the Canadian Zinc All Season Road proposal. The selected contractor will provide professional advice tailored to Parks Canada standards.

**Contract Details:**
* Contract duration: Until March 31, 2025
* Estimated contract value: Not specified

**Eligibility and Procurement:**
This tender is open to Canadian businesses or organizations with the required expertise. National Parks Regulations require all work to be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

**Submission Guidelines:**
* Responses to the bid solicitation must be submitted via fax or email.
* The only acceptable email address is [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
* Bid documents must be sent as email attachments, not links.
* The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.

**Quels doutes ou préoccupations?**
* Technical and contractual questions should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority.
* Enquiries must be received no later than 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

**Contact Information:**
* Aarondeep Maan, Contract Officer
* [aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca](mailto:aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca)
* 1-855-983-1808 (fax)

**Attachments:**
The tender announcement includes three attachments:
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/07495991822e494710bb07be3b79350f/rfp_-_22-0200.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/07495991822e494710bb07be3b79350f/rfp_-_22-0200.pdf)
